mapper.sql: ID, DL1, DL2, FLBM, LB, ZCMC, ERPBM, ZCBM, SL, ZZPH, SYDWMC, SYDWDM, ZGDWMC, ZGDWDM, FZRMC, FZRDM, GGXH, ZBHRQ, ZBHRQ2, YSYNX, ZCYZ, ZJNX, YXZT, DD, BZ, YLZD1, YLZD2, YLZD3, YLZD4,ZT
mapper.delete: update app_gdzc_img set isdel='1',DELR=#{DELR},DELT=SYSDATE() where ID=#{ID}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from app_gdzc where (zcbm,submitdate) in (select zcbm,max(SUBMITDATE) from app_gdzc group by zcbm) and (isdel <>'1' or isdel is null)
order by
${sort},
status desc,submitdate desc

SELECT * from app_gdzc where (zcbm,submitdate) in (select zcbm,max(SUBMITDATE) from app_gdzc group by zcbm) and (isdel <>'1' or isdel is null)
and sydwdm in (select id from sys_office where id=#{c2} or parent_id =#{c2})
and (zcmc like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%') or dl1 like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%') or dl2 like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%') or lb like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%') or zzph like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%') or ggxh like CONCAT('%',#{c4},'%'))
order by
${sort},
status desc,submitdate desc

SELECT * from app_gdzc where (zcbm,submitdate) in (select zcbm,max(SUBMITDATE) from app_gdzc group by zcbm) and (isdel <>'1' or isdel is null)
and sydwdm in (select id from sys_office where id=#{c2} or parent_id =#{c2})
order by
${sort},
status desc,submitdate desc
SELECT * from app_gdzc where id in (${scope})
SELECT * from app_gdzc_audit where relationid in (${scope})

SELECT a.*,(select name from sys_office where id=a.deptid) DEPTMC, date_format(submitdate, '%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') SBDATE from app_gdzc_audit a where (isdel <>'1' or isdel is null)
and deptid in (select id from sys_office where id=#{c2} or parent_id =#{c2})
and status=#{c3}
order by
${sort},
status desc,submitdate desc
select a.*,(select name from sys_user b where b.id=a.submitter) NNN,date_format(submitdate, '%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') SBDATE from app_gdzc a where zcbm =#{c5} order by SUBMITDATE desc
select id,name,(select name from sys_office a where a.id=b.parent_id) pname from sys_office b where FIND_IN_SET(b.id, getChildren(#{ROOTID})) order by sort
select * from app_gdzc_img where zcbm=#{c1} and (isdel <>'1' or isdel is null) order by submitdate desc
